channel.title: How do i add ::pnpc to my server also needed to use ring of stone etc!
channel.description: well i cant use ::pnpc to change into npcs and when i wear ring of stone the npc the ring of stone uses which is supposed to change me doesnt change me im using a testscape based server,thankyou[br][size=1]Posted at: December 16, 2006, 07:58:46 AM[/size][hr]anyone?????

item.title: How do i add ::pnpc to my server also needed to use ring of stone etc!
item.dc:creator: @Informer Informer
item.description:
@Informer wrote:

You need to know the # of the npc you want to add Example: ::npc 1274
Enjoy!
